name: (364) Brookline Village, Free Parking, W/D
neighborhood_overview: Brookline is one of Boston's wealthiest and prestige neighborhoods. It included top Hospitals, Schools, and a great public transportation system. Beautiful Brookline Village is right around the corner from Longwood medical district, including Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Boston Children's Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital and Dana-Farber Cancer Institute. The apartment is located 5 minutes walk to the T for quick and easy transportation to all parts of the city!
description:
Stay healthy with us! With all the craziness going on around us, feel comfortable knowing that our cleaners are wiping down everything! We are wiping down door knobs, keypads, and keeping our environments clean! Avoid the busy hotels and large common areas, Stay safe, clean and healthy with us!

The space
Free Parking on premises!
Quaint One bedroom apartment with a pull out couch in the living room for second sleeping arrangements. This cute apartment is located in Brookline Village, close to the Universities, the heart of Boston, Hospitals and much more!
Inside you'll find that the kitchen is fully equipped for cooking, there is an in-unit washer and dryer and high speed internet with an Xfinity Flex box.
Come stay!

Guest access
Lock box - Code will be released the day before check-in.

Other things to note
Host needs prior notice if extra linens or baby equipment are needed.

PARKING: free
